unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent at Infosys. We prioritize visits to IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. Looking forward to onboarding new graduates by August 2024. Our team will be at BITS Pilani on 25/07/2024 at 10:00 hrs. Expecting a good turnout. Interview schedules will be shared by 18/07/2024. It's an investment in future leaders! Jai Hind.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent at I N F O S Y S. We prioritize visits to I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad. Looking forward to onboarding new graduates by August two thousand and twenty four. Our team will be at B I T S Pilani on twenty fifth July two thousand and twenty four at ten zero zero hours. Expecting a good turnout. Interview schedules will be shared by eighteenth July two thousand and twenty four. It's an investment in future leaders! Jai Hind.
